scene_description_enriched: A haloed figure, likely Saint Luke, is depicted seated at a desk, diligently writing on a scroll. The figure wears a cap and a cloak. To the left of the desk, a stack of books rests. To the right, a winged ox, a symbol of Saint Luke, is shown kneeling. The scene takes place indoors, within a room featuring a window with tracery and a tiled floor. The background suggests an interior architectural setting with wooden panels.
